channel.title: I'd like to learn
channel.description: How to make my own private server and stuff. I'm an admin on 15 servers, yet I can't help code any of them because I don't know how. Fancy talk and sucking up will only get me so far ya know. So, I'd like to learn how to code. And don't try and teach me all of it at once, I have trouble picking up new words like "java" and "format" and "the". So, if someone out there is feeling particularly helpful tonight, could someone teach me the ways of the honorable coder?

item.title: I'd like to learn
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Your grandpa still owes me $20 . . .

Read full topic

item.title: I'd like to learn
item.dc:creator: @one_uglybird one uglybird
item.description:
@one_uglybird wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

Learn

Jesus Chr- I CAN’T DO ALL THAT!!! Alright, f it, I give up… Now I see why people who make priv servers are so mad all the time… If I had to code, and host, I’d be pretty pissed off too =P

[size=3pt]Like grandpa used to always say about me behind my back, “That boy’s got a whole lotta quit in him.”[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: I'd like to learn
item.dc:creator: @one_uglybird one uglybird
item.description:
@one_uglybird wrote:

If you want to learn sarcasm, go outside, not assuming there’s no such thing as sarcasm.

Notice the difference? One is for comedic relief, the other is for people who are in denial.

Edit: -Bird ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 09:26:32 PM[/size][hr]So, Alexia, we cool? Are you going to stop harrassing noobs like me who want to learn, but are too stupid to realize they’re posting in the wrong forum? It’s not like I did it on purpose, so calm down, and I’m sorry, k? It said tutorials so, I figured, “Hey, here’s the place for me!” Ya know? So… Can ya lay off? Ty.

Read full topic

item.title: I'd like to learn
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

If you want to learn new words… go to http://www.dictionary.com not http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf

Notice the difference? One if for private servers, and the other is for anything there is to know about every word in the world.

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: I'd like to learn
item.dc:creator: @one_uglybird one uglybird
item.description:
@one_uglybird wrote:

[quote=“alexia, post:3, topic:34856”]How did you get to be and administrator on 15 servers without being able to follow rules?

-Alexia[/quote]

How did you get 50 rep when you treat people who are eager to learn, and benefit the community, the way you’re treating me?

-Bird[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 09:17:09 PM[/size][hr][quote=“dinetime, post:6, topic:34856”][quote author=one uglybird link=topic=50056.msg614403#msg614403 date=1165997484]
How to make my own private server and stuff. I’m an admin on 15 servers, yet I can’t help code any of them because I don’t know how. Fancy talk and sucking up will only get me so far ya know. So, I’d like to learn how to code. And don’t try and teach me all of it at once, I have trouble picking up new words like “java” and “format” and “the”. So, if someone out there is feeling particularly helpful tonight, could someone teach me the ways of the honorable coder?
[/quote]

format=what is writen=what way is writen (example:chinese “it is writen in a chinese format with chinese words as the format”,or “the format of this sentence is gary raped monkey gary raped ass gary,is very bad writin format”)

:)[/quote]

Ok, now that I actually understood. In all seriousness, I thank you, because now I learned a new word. My brain feels like exploding though, cuz I’m in spanish 1, and I’m making a better grade in there than in english by like 30 points =O

Read full topic

[size=1pt] No seriously, if you request on here, or via pm to hear the story of why my stunt man is so expensive, then I’ll tell it! [/size]

Anyways, so as not to get yelled at for people mis-construing this as spam, could a mod move this to help plz? Ty.
